name: Leandro Eraso
label: Frontend Developer venturing into the world of programming.
summary: My name is Leandro Eraso. I am 21 years old. I like football, going to the gym, and videogames. I always wanted to learn to program but never made the time for it. Now that I have learned, I want to develop myself as a professional in this area. I am currently in my third year of Information Systems Engineering at UTN, soon to be a Systems Licensee and an Engineer in the near future. I started studying programming in 2023, learning Java and then I moved to the Frontend side learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
